reviewText: [SAME TIME EVERY YEAR - 1981 - Directed by Fred J. Lincoln] Though it may not be considered a 'hardcore classic', this film plays to the strengths of Fred Lincoln's talent for near wall-to-wall sex scenes, energetic performances and a bevy of fine female talent. The plot is established in the first five minutes, thankfully, and then we're witness to scene after scene of what we signed on for.With actresses/performers like Tiffany Clark, Loni Sanders (in 2 scenes), China Leigh, Lee Carroll, Holly McCall and Kathy Harcourt, among others, you're bound to find a few babes that appeal to your erotic fantasies. As far as the men are concerned, who cares? Do I care if hedgehog Ron Jeremy is in this? Not on your life; I've never seen someone as repugnant as that clown in a porn film, and my heart bleeds for the women assigned to have sex with him, but I digress. The bawdy babes and brisk sexual escapades are well worth your retro viewing buck, and that's all that matters.
summary: A Decent Example of 80's Retro Porn...

reviewText: Classic porno for the 70's. Oral sex  is very prominent in the movie. Some plot and dialogue help the obvious story flow okay. It definitely can be arousing for couples to watch, as some characters are quite provocative.

reviewText: Generally positive reviews on Amazon enticed me to view this basically hardcore film, but lack of a story line was disappointing. It sure does have mostly attractive actors. There is a hint of a plot, and although that's not what you would get this kind of film for, had a few more minutes been spent on developing a plot, the movie would have a story, the scenes would have flowed together better and this might have become a couples movie rather than just another hardcore film. I agree with some of the others comments about Ron Jeremy. Even in his slimmer days he would be a turn off. The women are beautiful, though. The sex, including oral sex,  is overly long and a bit repetitious.
summary: Could Have Been A Lot Better
